name: Human, we have a problem
description: Collect rocks and defend a tiny planet populated by weird spatial sheep.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 300 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires a virtual reality headset.
